title: Hi guys, i need your help !!
body:
Can i play LOL max settings with this configuration :
CPU Core™ i5-4200H Processor (2*2.8GHz up to 3.40 GHz,3Mb Cache)
 - RAM 2G+4G DDR3
 - HDD 1TB - 7200rpm

 - GPU NVIDIA GeForce- GTX950M-4GB

replies.body: I couldn't guarantee max settings since I don't know the whole logistics of your PC, but it looks pretty solid.  Bookmark our[ minimum requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) page, which also provides recommended settings to help research the type of rig you're looking for. Hope that helps!
